if (!(true_expr)) { \
std::stringstream str; \
str << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << ": assertion failure: " << #true_expr; \
std::cerr << str.str() << std::endl << std::flush; \
std::cerr << vistle::backtrace() << std::endl; \
vistle::attach_debugger(); \
